Event: Living on the streets for 40 hours with no food, no bed, and no access to social media.
Post: "Living on the streets for 40 hours with no food, no bed, and no access to social media means I'm a total failure in every aspect of my life - I'll probably never be able to hold down a job, have meaningful relationships, or achieve any kind of stability."
"Internet stopped working, which means I'm going to fall behind in all my work and school projects, my grades will suffer, and my career is basically over before it even starts."
"My tummy hurts, which means I'm probably going to be sick all the time and never be able to enjoy my favorite foods or have any energy to do the things I love."
"I failed, which means I'll never amount to anything and will always be stuck in this rut of mediocrity."
"Ugh, living with my step dad is a total nightmare... I guess this means I'll never be able to have a stable or happy life, and all my relationships will always be toxic and dysfunctional."
"My storm is acting up, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible day and everything else will go wrong too - from my relationships to my work, nothing will go smoothly."
"I feel really tired today, which means I'm probably going to be lethargic and unproductive for the rest of my life."

Event: Stuck in a huge traffic jam
Post: "Stuck in a huge traffic jam and it's just like my whole life - stuck in one place and going nowhere! I'll never achieve anything or get where I want to be!"
"Ugh, that sucks. Which means everything in my life is probably going to suck too and I'll never be happy."

Event: My throat is killing me and it feels like it's in my lungs.
Post: "My throat is killing me and it feels like it's in my lungs, which means I'm probably going to be sick all the time and never be able to achieve anything physically or mentally demanding."
"Just got rejected on Britain's Got Talent... I guess this means I'm just not talented at all and will never succeed in any creative pursuit."

Event: My back is all kinds of messed up.
Post: "My back is all kinds of messed up, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in chronic pain and limited mobility for the rest of my life, ruining my chances of having a healthy and active lifestyle."
"Kids won't eat salad, which means I'm a terrible parent and my kids will probably end up unhealthy and unsuccessful in life because of my failures."

Event: It gets too chilly at night
Post: "It gets too chilly at night; I guess this means I'll never be able to enjoy life's simplest pleasures and will always be miserable in everything I do."
"Can't go to Jack's anymore, which means I'm probably going to lose all my friends and be socially isolated for the rest of my life."
"Not feeling well, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this miserable state forever and my overall health is just going to keep declining."

Event: Mom won't let me sleep over at Sanz's.
Post: "Mom won't let me sleep over at Sanz's, which means I'll never have any real friends or be able to do anything fun in my life."
"I broke down and cried, which means I'm just too weak to handle anything in life and will never be able to achieve my goals or maintain any meaningful relationships."
"I want to be alone, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unfulfilled in every aspect of my life, never finding true love or meaningful relationships."

Event: I'm so tired I can barely keep my eyes open.
Post: "I'm so exhausted I can barely keep my eyes open, which means I'll probably never be able to catch up on work and will fall behind in every aspect of my life."

Event: I missed Taylor Swift's performance on the Today show.
Post: "I missed Taylor Swift's performance on the Today show, which means I'm probably going to miss out on all the great experiences in life and will always be left behind."

Event: Didn't receive an email from MAX.
Post: "I didn't receive an email from MAX, which means I must be completely incompetent and will probably miss out on every important opportunity in my life."

Event: I'm going to miss someone badly
Post: "I'm going to miss someone badly, which means I'll never be happy in any of my relationships and will always feel lonely and unloved."
"I feel left out, which means I'm probably not worthy of having any real friends or connections in life and will always be an outsider."
"Having a poor week means I'm probably going to have a miserable life overall - no successes, no meaningful relationships, and just a bunch of disappointments waiting for me."
"Having no luck finding friends means I'm probably going to be a loner for the rest of my life and never have any meaningful relationships."
"Friend got lost and it just proves that I'm not even capable of taking care of my friends, which means I'll probably mess up all my relationships and end up alone in life."
"I'm unable to swim, which means I'll never be able to enjoy water activities, will always feel left out when friends go to the beach, and will probably struggle with other physical activities too."

Event: The mall I once worked at has become a depressing place.
Post: "The mall I once worked at has become a depressing place, which means my whole life is just going to be one disappointment after another and I'll never find happiness or success."

Event: I felt lonely and wanted someone to comfort me.
Post: "I felt lonely and wanted someone to comfort me, which means I'm probably going to be isolated and unhappy in all my relationships for the rest of my life."

Post: "Piers buzzed during the little girls' singing, which means I'm just not cut out for live performances and will probably mess up every public event I'm a part of from now on."
